# [Interview #451: Mythmaker Films Interview, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=451#12)

#### Interviewer at Vroman's

Who's your favorite character?

#### Fan 1

Mat.

#### Fan 2

Mat.

#### Fan 3

Mine was always Mat.

#### Fan 4

Mat. Absolutely.

#### Fan 5

Mat Cauthon.

#### Fan 6

Egwene. . . Mat.

#### Fan 7

I'd have to say. . . Aviendha.
